items.title: Tata Power, Siemens among top bets by Chandan Taparia of MOFSL for today
items.description: Tata Power is trading near its all-time high price and given a range breakout on the weekly chart. The ADX indicator has turned up which supports the bullish trend.

items.title: Vinay Rajani of HDFC Securities suggests buying these stocks on Sept 25
items.description: Nifty has formed a spinning top like pattern on Sept 24 after remaining in a 125 points range. Nifty could now face resistance from 26,250 while 25,611-25,791 band could offer support.

items.title: Nifty Bank in overbought zone; Pvt Bank on the cusp of breakout; details
items.description: The Nifty Bank Index has entered the overbought zone according to technical indicators, signalling a potential near-term correction.

items.title: Market today: Dow, S&P500 at record high, Israel war, Manba IPO last day
items.description: Dow Jones and S&P 500 closed at record highs with a surge in mining stocks, buoyed by China's stimulus package

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Indian markets likely to take cues from Wall Street; GIFT Nifty muted
items.description: Stock Market Today: Indian equity markets were likely to open on a muted note, as indicated by GIFT Nifty futures, however, the record closing highs overnight on the Wall Street could boost sentiment.

items.title: Stocks To Watch: Infosys, Car Trade, SBI, Vadilal, NBCC, TVS Holdings
items.description: Stocks to Watch: The finance ministry may amend its circular to provide relief to Infosys regarding a Rs 30,000 crore GST demand.

items.title: KRN Heat Exchanger IPO GMP zooms 108% on opening day: should you subscribe?
items.description: KRN Heat Exchanger's shares are commanding a premium of Rs 239, which translates to a GMP of 108 per cent, against the upper end of the IPO price of Rs 220

items.title: Buy calls are slowly vanishing from the booming stock market of India
items.description: The Nifty 200 index is valued at about 24 times its 12-month forward earnings estimates, versus last decade's mean of about 19 times

items.title: PC Jeweller hits 52-wk high as board to consider stock split on Sept 30
items.description: The uptick in PC Jeweller stock came after the company announced that the board will meet on September 30 to consider a stock-split.

items.title: Subhash Ghai's firm soars 18% in a day after pact with Zee; here's why
items.description: Shares of Mukta Arts skyrocketed 18.2 per cent at Rs 95.70 per share intraday on the BSE

items.title: Hariom Pipes up 4% after board okays fundraising of Rs 700 crore; details
items.description: The rise in Hariom Pipes share price came after the company announced that its board has approved fund raising of Rs 700 crore through issuance of equity shares or any other eligible securities.

items.title: Delta Corp to demerge hospitality, real estate biz; share price gains 8%
items.description: Delta Corp's board has approved the demerger of its hospitality and real estate business to Delta Penland Private Ltd (DPPL)

items.title: ECOS (India) Mobility shares slip 5% on weak Q1 FY25 operational show
items.description: The fall in the ECOS (India) Mobility share price came on the back of weak operational performance in the June quarter of financial year 2025 (Q1FY25).

items.title: Final Hours! Manba Finance IPO closes today: GMP up 48%; should you apply?
items.description: Several brokerage firms, including Swastika Investmart, SMIFS, and BP Equities, have shared their reviews on Manba Finance IPO for the investors

items.title: IPO fundraise thus far in 2024 third highest in primary market history
items.description: IPO pipeline for the remaining part of CY24 remains strong. 25 companies plan to raise nearly Rs 63,550 crore and have Sebi's approval

items.title: Hindustan Foods shares rise 4% on plans to merge promoter owned entity
items.description: Hindustan Foods share price jumped 3.90 per cent at Rs 678 per share on the BSE in the early hours of trade on Wednesday

items.title: HEG surges 9% on fixing October 18 as record date for 10:2 stock split
items.description: With structural tailwinds, analysts at ICICI Securities expect demand and pricing recovery in graphite electrode space from H2FY25 onwards

items.title: Sarda Energy hits record high on securing nod to expand coal production
items.description: The rally in Sarda Energy share price came after the company announced that it has secured Chhattisgarh Environment Conservation Board nod to expand coal production from 1.44 MTPA to 1.68 MTPA.

items.title: Easy Trip drops to 52-week low after promoter likely sells 8.5% stake in co
items.description: The company's Co-founder and CEO Nishant Pitti was the likely seller in the multiple block deals transacted on the counter

items.title: F&O transaction fee revision sends MCX shares to hit record high on Sep 25
items.description: MCX share price: The futures contract on MCX will invite a transaction fee of Rs 2.1 per lakh of turnover value, while the options contract will be charged Rs 41.8 per lakh of premium turnover value

items.title: Gravita gains 4% as Axis Securities initiates coverage with 'Buy': Details
items.description: Analysts at Axis Securities believe that Gravita is well-positioned to capitalise on the burgeoning recycling industry, driven by global shifts toward sustainability and circular economies

items.title: Gillette India stock falls 3% after Bangladesh distributor terminates pact
items.description: Gillette India share price today dipped 3 per cent at Rs 8,501.10 a piece on the BSE in intraday deals

items.title: Mazagon Dock up 3% on commencing production for Multipurpose Cargo Vessel
items.description: The uptick in the share price came after the company announced that it has commenced the production activity for the first Multipurpose Cargo Vessel (MPV) for Navi Merchants, Denmark.

items.title: Why is PNB near its 8-month low after slipping 7% in 2 days? Details here
items.description: PNB shares have slipped after it announced Rs 109.16 per share as the floor price for the QIP, launched on September 23, that aims to raise Rs 7,500 crore.

items.title: Imagicaaworld Ent stock jumps 4% after co plans expansion in Indore
items.description: Imagicaaworld Entertainment share price today inched up by 3.69 per cent at Rs 87.25 a piece on the BSE in intraday deals

items.title: Piramal Pharma soar 9% as co targets 2x revenue, 3x Ebitda margin by FY30
items.description: Piramal Pharma aims to achieve over $2 billion in revenue by FY30, which implies 2 times growth in revenue compared with FY24

items.title: Here's how to trade Silver on September 25; Check resistance, support here
items.description: On Tuesday, silver surged sharply higher on an unexpectedly huge stimulus package announced by China's Central Bank and the Chinese authorities.

items.title: Indian equity funds' cash holdings at 5-yr high on caution over valuations
items.description: Although the rise in cash levels is partly due to inflows and the launch of new funds, caution is also a factor

items.title: Gold strategy: Yellow metal may extend its rally; Support at Rs 75,500
items.description: Gold hit a fresh record high of $2664 and closed with a hefty gain of 1.09 per cent at $2657.

items.title: PM Modi's IFSC Single Window System launch sends Dev IT shares flying 14%
items.description: The northward move in the stock price came on the back of the news that Prime Minister Narendra Modi has launched the Single Window IT System (SWIT) developed by Dev Information Technology

items.title: Here's why Max Estates share was buzzing in trade on Sept 25; details here
items.description: The uptick in the share price came after the company announced that it has received Rs 391 cr from New York Life Insurance Company for strategic investments in Max Towers & Max House (Phase I & II).
